label: Supply Chain Director
title: Supply Chain Director
description: Leads end-to-end supply chain strategy, planning, and execution including S&OP, network optimization, supplier collaboration, and operational excellence.
responsibilities: Define supply chain strategy and transformation roadmap
Drive continuous improvement and cost reduction
Ensure supply chain resilience and risk management
traditionalWorkflow: Monthly S&OP meetings with slide deck presentations
agenticWorkflow: Continuous S&OP with integrated demand, supply, financial planning
Real-time network optimization with scenario modeling
Automated supplier collaboration and performance tracking
Real-time supply chain control tower visibility
painPointsAddressed: Monthly S&OP cycles too slow for dynamic markets
Static network configuration suboptimal over time
Reactive approach increases costs and risk
kpis: Supply Chain Cost as % of Revenue

label: Logistics & Fulfillment Coordinator
title: Logistics & Fulfillment Coordinator
description: Manages day-to-day logistics, warehouse operations, order fulfillment, and last-mile delivery to ensure on-time, accurate customer deliveries.
responsibilities: Manage warehouse operations and labor scheduling
Track shipment status and resolve delivery issues
Monitor fulfillment KPIs and service levels
traditionalWorkflow: Manual dock scheduling and yard management
Reactive issue resolution via phone calls and emails
agenticWorkflow: Automated dock scheduling and yard optimization
Real-time fulfillment visibility across all locations
